name: Em-Mental
description:
A submission for Brackeys Game Jam 2020.1.  The theme was Holes.

  • Collect a ball in your mouse from the bottom of the cheese.
  • Pull the left and right strings (Left/Right Ctrl keys or "A" and "D") to manoeuvre your mouse to deliver the ball to the door at the top.
  • 5 times.
  • You're being timed.  See how fast you can do it!

If it wasn't a time limited (1 week) game jam, I would have found a way to create different faces for the cheese to increase the interest/difficulty.  Perhaps a two player mode would also work, especially if you could affect your opponent.  More work on the audio would be good too :-)

Press Esc to get back to the main menu.
